node.html: The second iteration of my personal website, designed in Figma, built with Gatsby and hosted on Netlify. This website was made as my first project working with web technologies.
A local delivery application for everyday items, helping connect local businesses to consumers. This app was made as a submission to uOttaHack 3.
The first iteration of my personal website, made with the technical preview of Flutter for Web as a proof of concept.
A bible app made with Flutter, utilizing Bible data from SQLite files. The app also features user authentication and stores user information on Cloud Firestore
A basic calculator application written in Assembly x86 with the Irvine32 library. This was made as a learning experience for Assembly x86.
A simple web browser made using Flutter. This was made when Flutter was in beta, before webviews were officially introduced in Flutter, and was a prood of concept that a webview can work in Flutter.
A neural network written in Java from scratch, to learn the basics of how a neural network functions. A basic feedforward network was tested with this network.
A Flight Simulator made with the 3D Engine I made, as a proof of concept that the engine is capable of creating a basic game.
Parallel, a VR first person shooter game made in Unity previously worked on by now defunct Illusios Studio.
A 3D Engine made using Java, using the Swing GUI widget toolkit. This was made to learn about how 3D models are transformed and rendered as polygons.
A simple 3d made game I made in Java usign JavaFX, as the final project to ICS3U.
